page.title: 03BADMINTON HORSE TRIALS.
page.content: This is the time-table of events for the 1985 Badminton Horse Trials.They are sponsored by the brewery company Whitbread. Wednesday 17th. April. 10.00 a.m. Briefing of competitors_ Badminton Village Hall. Inspection of the course. 5.00 p.m.Examination of horses_ North Front Badminton House. Thursday 18.th. April. 9.00a.m. Dressage. 6.30 p.m.Cocktail Party_ Badminton House. Friday 19th.April. 9.00a.m. Dressage Saturday 20th.April. 11.00a.m.Speed and endurance test. Sunday 21st.April. 10.00 a.m.Examination of horses. 11.00 a.m.Three Day Event Jumping. 4.30 p.m. Final Parade.
